alert.note: Alert for Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued July 20 at 1:26PM PDT until July 23 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 8 PM PDT SATURDAY... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 95 possible. The hot conditions may continue into Sunday. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, from 10 AM Friday to 8 PM PDT Saturday. For the Excessive Heat Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
